text:
e="preserve">Armando Merodio Pesquera (23 August 1935 – 21 June 2018) was a Spanish retired footballer. He was born in Barcelona. He played as a striker. He was known for playing with Athletic Bilbao from 1958 to 1963.
Merodio died on 21 June 2018 from congestive heart failure in Barcelona, aged 82.
